alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Tammany and southeastern Tangipahoa Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Covington. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington and Madisonville. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 51 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
